text: The 1920–21 Loyola Ramblers men's basketball team represents Loyola University Chicago during the 1920–21 NCAA men's basketball season. The ramblers were led by first-year head coach Bill Feeney. The team had finished the season with an overall record of 7–4. ==Schedule== |- ==References== Category:Loyola Ramblers men's basketball seasons Loyola Ramblers Loyola Ramblers Loyola Ramblers
title: 1920–21 Loyola Ramblers men's basketball team
